snippet: A move by Damien Hirst to depart his longtime representative raises questions of loyalty in a shifting art world.
abstract: British artist Damien Hirst announces he is leaving Gagosian Gallery, where he has been represented for 17 years; some see Hirst's move, and similar defections from other prominent galleries, as sign of larger art world trend that artists have become bigger stars than their galleries.
lead_paragraph: A move by Damien Hirst to depart his longtime representative raises questions of loyalty in a shifting art world.

headline.seo: Damien Hirst Leaving Gagosian Gallery After 17 Years
headline.main: Artist’s Exit Sets Back Gagosian Gallery
headline.print_headline: Artist’s Exit Sets Back Gagosian Gallery
